info: For strength heroes, it grants 90 health, 0.5 health regen, 0.4% magic resistance, 0.64 armor, 4 attack speed, 0.2% movement speed, 48 mana, 0.2 mana regen, 0.28% spell damage and 4 attack damage.
For agility heroes, it grants 72 health, 0.4 health regen, 0.32% magic resistance, 0.8 armor, 5 attack speed, 0.25% movement speed, 48 mana, 0.2 mana regen, 0.28% spell damage and 4 attack damage.

For intelligence heroes, it grants 72 health, 0.4 health regen, 0.32% magic resistance, 0.64 armor, 4 attack speed, 0.2% movement speed, 60 mana, 0.25 mana regen, 0.35% spell damage and 4 attack damage.
